short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a 'Share With Students' button to all Google Docs, Slides, and Sheets documents.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you use a class management system other than Google Classroom? Then you'll have noticed how many students forget to share assignments with you, prompting you to ask them to share it, and it evolves into a huge, unnecessary mess. This extension solves that problem by creating a "Share With Students" button in Google Docs, Slides, and Sheets. When clicked, it generates a link that will automatically copy the document and share it with you whenever a student clicks it.
